attributes.background: the council have decided to get rid of school libraries and librarians - this will negatively impact literacy levels especially in poorer areas and means people can't educate themselves in school using books or using the library to study - do not get rid of school libraries and librarians

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
